mapper.insert: insert into READER_MESSAGE (id, creator, create_date, deleted, picking_status, picking_batch_no, picking_amount, picking_count, channel_id, url, title, release_date, pageview, comment_count, digest) values (#{id}, #{creator}, #{createDate}, #{deleted}, #{pickingStatus}, #{pickingBatchNo}, #{pickingAmount}, #{pickingCount}, #{channelId}, #{url}, #{title}, #{releaseDate}, #{pageview}, #{commentCount}, #{digest})
mapper.select: select * from READER_MESSAGE where deleted = '0' and url = #{url}
select count(*) from READER_MESSAGE where deleted = '0' and channel_id = #{channelId}
mapper.update: update READER_MESSAGE set last_modifier = #{lastModifier}, last_modify_date = #{lastModifyDate}, deleted = #{deleted}, picking_status = #{pickingStatus}, picking_count = #{pickingCount} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from READER_MESSAGE where deleted = '0' and picking_status = #{pickingStatus} order by create_date asc limit 1
select * from READER_MESSAGE where deleted = '0' and picking_batch_no = #{pickingBatchNo} order by create_date asc limit 1
